job_tasks.phrase: Experience (non-internship) in professional software development
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the general practice of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience designing or architecting (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems
job_tasks.justification: This describes core software engineering responsibilities related to system design and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence describes the team's purpose and the value proposition of their products for developers, indicating a business context.

job_tasks.phrase: We provide the IDE Toolkits for Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio, and Visual Studio Code.
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific development tools that the team supports, implying software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: With AWS Cloud9, we also provide our customers with a Web-based IDE.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of a web-based IDE, a software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Our goal is enable professional developers to create applications targeting the Cloud, Server-less or containers.
job_tasks.justification: This states the objective of enabling developers to build applications, a software development focus.

job_tasks.phrase: We help them author, debug, test, and ultimately deploy code on AWS.
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental activities within the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be part of a team building a new AWS service to enhance the developer experience in Cloud.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of a new service, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: The team works in close collaboration with other AWS services such as AWS Cloud9, AWS Fargate, and AWS ECS.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with other services implies understanding the broader AWS ecosystem and how services integrate, relating to business context.

job_tasks.phrase: AWS Utility Computing (UC) provides product innovations - from foundational services such as Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3) and Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), to consistently released new product innovations that continue to set AWS's services and features apart in the industry.
job_tasks.justification: This mentions foundational AWS services like S3 and EC2, which are core to cloud infrastructure and data storage/compute, hinting at data engineering aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: As a member of the UC organization, you'll support the development and management of Compute, Database, Storage, Internet of Things (Iot), Platform, and Productivity Apps services in AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This details the broad range of services that the role supports, all of which involve software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
job_tasks.justification: This is a general skill for software engineers, applied within a development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with external entities signifies engagement with the wider technology landscape and business partnerships.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about developing software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of product creation and deployment, a software development lifecycle activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in on-call rotation
job_tasks.justification: On-call responsibility often involves monitoring and maintaining production systems, which is an operations aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.
job_tasks.justification: Root-cause analysis and ensuring system resilience are key operational responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You would work on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Next Gen DevX (NGDE) team where we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the application of generative AI to reimagine developer experiences, a software development task involving advanced technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building AI-enhanced tools and services for engineers, a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: we are going to use generative AI and foundation models
job_tasks.justification: This directly states the use of generative AI and foundation models, which involves working with and potentially fine-tuning or applying these models.

job_tasks.phrase: explore new technologies and find creative solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies, especially in the context of AI, implies experimentation and potentially modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase encompasses multiple standard software development lifecycle phases and practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Experience designing or architecting (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems
passionate about building services and tools for developers
Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
play a vital part in growing your peers
contribute to the culture and direction

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions using 'generative AI and foundation models' to reimagine developer experiences, indicating a focus on the core technologies of a GenAI Engineer. While there is significant software development and operations, the explicit mention of GenAI and its application to tools points towards this profile.
